greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Antidiagonal sums of array A268715: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} A003188(A006068(n)+A006068(n-k)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4096
program: (define (add intfun lowlim uplim) (let sumloop ((i lowlim) (res 0)) (cond ((> i uplim) res) (else (sumloop (1+ i) (+ res (intfun i)))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 15 2016
